snippet: Facing the recall of 1.6 million cars weeks into her tenure as chief executive, Mary T. Barra has taken the lead role in handling the crisis, starting an internal inquiry and ordering a rare public apology.
abstract: General Motors chief executive Mary T Barra, facing recall of 1.6 million cars weeks into her tenure, takes lead role in handling crisis, starting internal inquiry and ordering rare public apology.
